summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Fort Street, from 27th Avenue West to 32nd Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7915 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds". .
